pr_title: Provide classes that can be used as unique keys for device registry s…

timeline.message: Provide classes that can be used as unique keys for device registry storage implementations

timeline.bodyText: I would recommend to name the method credentialKey instead of from. The reason for that is, when using static imports, you will get a name clash with the other from methods.
timeline.author: ctron

replies.bodyText: Static imports are treated as errors by the checkstyle plugin, so we can't use them (except in tests). And we have pattern of using from() methods in these kind of value objects throughout the codebase. Also, there was also of() in TenantHandle, so it should be consistent now.
replies.author: dejanb
